entry.title: PhDone: Vivin Vinod is now Dr. Vivin Vinod!

link.title: PhDone: Vivin Vinod is now Dr. Vivin Vinod!

entry.content:
Vivin Vinod succesfully defended his PhD at the University of Wuppertal finishing with summa cum laude.

On 19-May-2025 Vivin defended his PhD dissertation titled Multifidelity machine learning methods for quantum chemical properties. The examination committe was composed of of Prof. Dr. Peter Zaspel (University of Wuppertal), Prof. Dr. Ulrich Kleinekathöfer (Constructor University), Prof. Dr. Mario Barbatti (Aix-Marseille University), Prof. Dr. Matthias Bolten (University of Wuppertal), and Prof. Dr. Matthias Ehrhardt (University of Wuppertal). The committe unanimously awarded Vivin the degree of Dr. rer. nat. with a final grade of summa cum laude, the highest distinction.

entry.title: Vivin Vinod joins the Group of Prof. Dr. Peter Zaspel as a Ph.D. Research Associate

link.title: Vivin Vinod joins the Group of Prof. Dr. Peter Zaspel as a Ph.D. Research Associate

entry.content:
Vivin has joined the group of Prof. Dr. Peter Zaspel at the Jacobs University, Bremen to pursue his Ph.D. research in machine learning methods for quantum chemistry.

With an interdiscplinary background, a masters in economics and a bachelor’s in physics with honours, Vivin is looking forward to gaining further expertise in machine learning methods specific to quantum chemical systems. His master’s thesis focussed on machine learning methods for financial markets.
